Verify the identity of contacts by sending an IdentityCheck request to their email address. Save time and reduce risk of handling personal data. IdentityChecks can be requested in one click, and the outcome is sent via an email notification or in our simple dashboard.

Perfect for:
* Client onboarding at Accountants, Lawyers, Financial Services, or other regulated businesses
* Marketplaces
* Online Sales
* Loan/credit applications
* Student enrolments
* Many more...!

Key benefits:
* Save time and money with simple to use interface
* Reduce operational and compliance risks
* Privacy and security friendly
* Frictionless experience for end users
